scripts.build: tsc && cpy .env out && cpy ./language out && cpy config-orginal.json out && cpy settings-orginal.json out && rename out\config-orginal.json config.json && rename out\settings-orginal.json settings.json && pkg ./out/McHateBot.js -t node18-win-x64 -c package.json && cpy config-orginal.json exe && cpy settings-orginal.json exe && cpy ./language exe && cpy .env exe && rename exe\config-orginal.json config.json && rename exe\settings-orginal.json settings.json
